alert.note: Alert for Christian; Douglas; Greene; Lawrence; Stone; Webster (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 11:19AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Webster, northwestern Douglas, Christian, northern Stone, east central Lawrence and southern Greene Counties through 1145 AM CDT... At 1118 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Strafford to near Battlefield to near Mount Vernon. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Springfield, Nixa, Ozark, Republic, Battlefield, Mount Vernon, Rogersville, Strafford, Marionville, Clever, Seymour, Sparta, Billings, Highlandville, Fremont Hills, Fordland, Brookline, Diggins, Hurley and Chesapeake. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 47 and 56, and between mile markers 59 and 98. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Christian; Douglas; Greene; Lawrence; Stone; Webster
